term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - discomfort threshold in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: discomfort threshold

item.text: The lowest value (e.g. concentration of an impurity, etc.) at which a sensation of discomfort is perceived; a measure which varies from person to person.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2185 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
